atom.description: User can update their profile information and change their password
observableOutcomes: User can update individual profile fields via PATCH request
Password change requires current password verification before accepting new password
Updated profile fields are persisted and visible on subsequent retrieval
atom.reasoning: Consolidated from profile.spec.ts covering two distinct describe blocks: profile updates and password management. These are independent behaviors that could be tested and replaced separately, violating the single-behavior principle. However, the scope is narrower than a full CRUD consolidation.
